data.title: Official Release Date Announcement Trailer
data.meta_description: Undisputed marks the return of major boxing games being developed by Steel City Interactive. Players will step into the ring with boxing legends such as Tyson Fury, Oleksandr Usyk, Canelo Alvarez, Katie Taylor, Roy Jones Jr., and more. Get technical with over 60 different punches, defensive tools, and revolutionary footwork mechanics, and more. Undisputed is leaving Early Access and launching into 1.0 on October 11 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series S|X. and PC.
data.text:
Try to guess the video game: In the input field, type a question that could be answered "yes" or "no". You can ask up to 20 questions before the game is over.

Quick tips to help you guess the answer faster
